descriptions.title: Email Address Security
descriptions.question: How well does this website protect your email address?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They ask for it and use/share/sell it for uses other than the intended service.
descriptions.answer_yellow: They ask for it, but use it only for the intended service.
descriptions.answer_green: They do not ask for it.

descriptions.title: PII Security
descriptions.question: How well does this website protect your credit card information and address?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They ask for it and use/share/sell it for uses other than the intended service.
descriptions.answer_yellow: They ask for it, but use it only for the intended service.
descriptions.answer_green: They do not ask for it.

descriptions.title: Social Security Number
descriptions.question: How well does this website handle your social security number?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They ask for it and use/share/sell it for uses other than the intended service.
descriptions.answer_yellow: They ask for it, but use it only for the intended service.
descriptions.answer_green: They do not ask for it.

descriptions.title: Targeted Advertising
descriptions.question: Does this website use or share your personally identifiable information for marketing purposes?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They share/sell your personally identifiable information for ads and marketing.
descriptions.answer_yellow: They do use your personally identifiable information for ads and marketing but do not sell/share it to/with third parties.
descriptions.answer_green: They do not use your personally identifiable information for ads and marketing.

descriptions.title: Location Tracking
descriptions.question: Does this website track or share your location?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They track it and use/share/sell it for uses other than the intended service.
descriptions.answer_yellow: They track it, but use it only for the intended service.

descriptions.title: COPPA Compliance
descriptions.question: Does this website collect personally identifiable information from children under 13?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They do allow children to use their website and store their personally identifiable information without parental consent.
descriptions.answer_yellow: They do not talk about it.
descriptions.answer_green: They do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information of children.

descriptions.title: Law Enforcement
descriptions.question: Does this website share your information with law enforcement?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They do not require a Warrant/Subpoena.
descriptions.answer_green: They will not share your information, because they do not keep your information.

descriptions.title: Privacy Policy Opt-Out
descriptions.question: Does this website notify or allow you to opt-out after changing their privacy policy?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They may change policies at anytime, even without posting it.
descriptions.answer_yellow: They post new policies but you cannot opt out.
descriptions.answer_green: They post new policies and you can opt out.

descriptions.title: Data Control
descriptions.question: Does this website allow you to edit or delete your information from its records?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_green: You can edit/delete all of your information.

descriptions.title: Data Aggregation
descriptions.question: Does this website collect or share aggregated data related to your identity or behavior?
descriptions.answer_default: When PrivacyCheck™ is run, the answer to the above question will appear here!
descriptions.answer_red: They aggregate data with personally identifiable information.
descriptions.answer_yellow: They aggregate data but remove personally identifiable information first.
descriptions.answer_green: They will not aggregate data, because they do not keep your information.
